title: Mount and Blade Version .903
description:
Alright, this is my First Torrent, so be kind. It is of Mount and Blade Version .903 (ACTIVATED). I am still somewhat skeptical if the Activation will roll over from my computer, to yours, so I zipped the ENTIRE GAME to your computer.


Mount and Blade is a Strategy Game created by Taleworlds, an Husband and Wife Developer Team. Its only 15 Bucks for a LEGAL Copy, I highly recommend you actually buy the game as it is great, and its pretty cheap. Its still in the Beta, and it has a very good Modding Community with a "Module System" that allows it to switch between mods with the click of a button at the Main Menu. It is a Roleplaying/Real Time Strategy Game, it is a very unique and special game that you will enjoy. Well Have fun.





Instructions

-----------------
Extract Demo.zip (I put it like that to fool ISPs, they started to figure out when people were pirating games) To C:\Program Files\Talewords\Mount&Blade

After that go to your Desktop and right-click, go to new->Shortcut and put in the file path C:\Program Files\Taleworlds\Mount&Blade\Mount&Blade.exe

After that, click the Shortcut, and enojoy


System Specifications

Windows XP
-------------
514 RAM
2.5Ghz Processor
64Mb Graphics Card

Windows Vista
------------
3Ghz Processor
1024mb RAM
64mb Graphics Card
